parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns status of [[enableEnvironment]] command

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''environmentEnabled'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format [ambientLife, ambientSound] where:
* ambientLife: [[Boolean]] 
* ambientSound: [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_enabled = [[environmentEnabled]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableEnvironment]], [[fadeEnvironment]], [[environmentVolume]], [[initAmbientLife]], [[sideAmbientLife]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[setSoundEffect]]
</value></part></template>




<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
